About This Website

Currently, I write all of my "content" in markdown. Then, I build the site with Eleventy locally and published to Github for hosting. I've done all of the writing by and templates myself, but Eleventy helps automate the process and is so much simpler. If you haven't looked at it before, I would definitely recommend it over Jekyll or writing your HTML by hand. I've had personally experience with both, and both SUCK.

Future Plans

  • I'd like to move to a different domain, as I prefer my flowersin alias over ems7d4.
  • I'd like to add more content about my homelab and linux setups! At some point, I'd like to create more informative or instructional content as well.
  • I'd also love to talk more about music and ditching spotify.
